Control.Text: These are general options and affect the general appearance and functionality of CandyBars
Control.Name: General

Control.Text: These options control the main action bar. The main action bar is where your abilities are kept. Your innate ability can also be shown here. Like the other bars, the action bar can be arranged in a grid.
Control.Name: ActionBar
NewProfile
Control.Tooltip: To create a new profile, type the desired name into the input box and press return.

Control.Name: Current
Control.Tooltip: Here you can select which profile you would like to use.

Control.Name: Copy
Control.Tooltip: Here you can import the settings from another profile into your current one.

Control.Name: Delete
Control.Tooltip: If you do not want a certain profile anymore you can delete it here.

Control.Text: To set a keybind, hover the cursor over the button you want to set then press the key you wish to bind. When you are done and before you continue playing, press Exit.
Control.Name: Description

Control.Text: These bars are used as a replacement for when the stock Action Bar addon is disabled. Although this is supported, it is recommended that you use the HUD controls instead.
Control.Name: UnderConstruction
GridSize
Control.Tooltip: Here you can import the settings from another profile into your current one.

Control.Text: Layout Mode is disabled. To enable, please click the enable button below
Control.Name: DisabledAlert

Control.Text: This is an advanced feature and will override or disable some of the existing Action Bar optioins.
Control.Name: AdvancedText

Control.Text: These options let you show / hide certain parts of the default UI. It is highly recommended that you use these options instead of disabling the stock Action Bar addon.
Control.Name: Description
NewProfile
Control.Tooltip: To create a new profile, type the desired name into the input box and press return.

Control.Name: Current
Control.Tooltip: Here you can select which profile you would like to use.

Control.Name: Copy
Control.Tooltip: Here you can import the settings from another profile into your current one.

Control.Name: Delete
Control.Tooltip: If you do not want a certain profile anymore you can delete it here.

Control.Text: To access the options for CandyBars please type.
Control.Name: Window
